website_summaries.verdict: These terry cloth bibs are a solid choice if you're searching for something that's not only protective but also comfortable to wear. Multipack delivers excellent value.
pros: Pure cotton terry cloth is highly absorbent, protecting garments from moderate spills and messes
Standard adult bib size provides full coverage for average frames
Safe for washing machine and dryer
Multipack ensures you'll always have a clean bib on hand
cons: No waterproof lining means these bibs are unlikely to protect against heavy spills

customer_reviews.title: Not Just For Old People
customer_reviews.text: This bib is excellent, my wife and I eat dinner a lot while watching TV in our recliners, invariably something falls off the fork and lands on our shirt/blouse. No more, we may look older wearing the bib, but it has saved many shirts/ blouses. These bibs are terry cloth and run through the wash with no deleterious effects. Call us old, but the bibs are great.
customer_reviews.author: Former non-listener of music

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: My mother in law needed something to prevent her from spilling things on her clothes so I purchased two packages of these. They arrived and upon first glance they were very rough in texture and not soft terry cloth like I had anticipated. I thought if I washed them they would fluff up and look and feel better. After washing them, there were loose threads from the poor quality of fabric and the edging on one was actually torn away from the ribbing. I would like to return these. My husband threw away the shipping box when he saw me put them in the wash thinking we would not need it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Kukich

customer_reviews.title: My 93 year old mother-in-law lives with us and she ...
customer_reviews.text: My 93 year old mother-in-law lives with us and she uses these for every meal. She is very particular about how she looks but has trouble holding food steady on her utensil. This covers her entire front and lap and keeps her looking sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. MARTIN

customer_reviews.title: Dimensions as described! Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for. Good quality, easy to clean, long length and terry cloth which keeps them in place on most shirts. They are easy to clean just throw them in the wash with your towels. Length not only covers your shirt but drapes easily across your lap for added protection. The blue color "hides" some of the stains looks a bit different then what is shown, actually a bit darker.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Lady

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased based on reviews I read, however bibs I received are made from very poor, extremely thin quality material, no better than you get in a bag of cheap shop towels. Just washed before first use and came out of washer with stitching coming undone, long threads and binding fraying. Fabric so thin that any spills would go right through and stain clothing underneath. I expect a waterproof backing on a bib. Size is good but velcro close does not hold. Will use as a pattern to make my own.
customer_reviews.author: PAW

customer_reviews.title: Finally, simple spill prevention!
customer_reviews.text: As pictured, and as described. Easy on and off with adjustable velcro closure; large and long enough to protect entire front of shirt. The terry cloth fabric is a medium density, just right for minor drips and spills. Washable and simple to store; the 3-pack is ideal for having backup always on hand. There a few stray terry cloth loops, but these are easily trimmed. Economical solution to keeping shirt fronts neat and tidy at mealtimes. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Loving G-ma

customer_reviews.title: Great help for anyone.
customer_reviews.text: We love them! My wife's mother is 97 years old and does use them daily! It has been extremely helpful for her when eating!!! Would definitely reorder them and recommend them to any one who might need them!!!!
customer_reviews.author: John J.  (Joe) Carey

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: Love these adult, terry cloth bibs. 2 Things I needed were: must close easily and must cover large area in front. These surely fit the bill. They close easy with Velcro, are very long and wash well. I'm so happy with these, I may order more. Update: I ordered this same set of 6 again for the same reasons. Long in front and Velcro closing. Patients with neuropathy in their hands can still easily close these themselves and they wash well.
customer_reviews.author: hula maiden

customer_reviews.title: Many uses for these bibs!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to order these for myself to protect my clothes when I brush my teeth or those times that I eat a meal in front of the TV. I would rather wash these than change clothes and I hate stained clothes. This is convenient. My only complaint is the huge neck hole when I fasten the velcro. The velcro strip is not long enough to really adjust at the neck. There is plenty of material so I have managed to push back the access. The terry cloth wanted to shed on my tops, but I have now washed the set and everything is good. I use these at home on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: sandyk

customer_reviews.title: quality not very good
customer_reviews.text: They are very thin. Did not contain a liquid spill as I have found out!! I could have used a plain terry cloth towel and done better. These are for my elderly mother and she tends to drop or spill whatever she is eating or drinking. I just don't want to be bothered sending them back, so I will use a terry cloth hand towel underneath them to absorb the liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Donna V

customer_reviews.title: Sloppy eater? No Worries! These Bibs Work!
customer_reviews.text: Clearly these bibs do the job. They could be a bit thicker and softer but they work just fine. My only real complaint is the small sized Velcro areas. I'm a big man with a big neck and although the bib does reach around my neck the small Velcro patch BARELY holds to its opposite side. It sometimes comes apart while wearing the bib at dinner time. No super biggie but it just need a larger Velcro patch. I do recommended these bibs. They come at a great price, are big enough for a big person and I like the blue color.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy eating my meals with chopsticks. Sometimes with soups or sauces I will drop something and it ends up on my sweater or my shirt. I ordered these to where when I am preparing food and eating a meal. So far they have been great. Very easy to put on, lightweight, and they do catch spills. I just received them a few days ago so I can't really comment on durability but I can imagine that they won't last. They look pretty Substantial an armada of terrycloth so I assume that they will go through the wash just fine. I'll update my review if it turns out I washed them once and there was a problem.
customer_reviews.author: drsteve

customer_reviews.title: Love these bibs !!!
customer_reviews.text: We love these bibs. The size is perfect and completely covers our shirts, so no food stains !! They are great for traveling and eating in the car which can be kind of messy. The quality is excellent. This is the second set I have purchased. Now we have plenty for home and traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Mc

customer_reviews.title: WITH A COATED FRONT TO CLEANUP EASY. I HAVE AN AQUAINTENCE THAT LIKE MY BIB'S ...
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT THE BIBS AS A BACKUP. I HAVE ANOTHER PRODUCT, WITH A COATED FRONT TO CLEANUP EASY. I HAVE AN AQUAINTENCE THAT LIKE MY BIB'S AND ASKED WERE TO BUY THEM. I FOUND YOUR OFFER FOR 3 AND I KEPT ONE FOR MYSELF AND GAVE TWO TO THE FRIEND. I LIKED THE ONE I KEPT, BETTER THEN MY OTHER BIB PRODUCT. MY ONLY SEGESTION MIGHT BE TO ADD A SNAP AT THE NECK TIE, BECAUSE THE VELCROW GETS DAMAGED WITH WASHING. IF THERE WOULD BE A SNAP IT WOULD MAKE AN ALTERNATE TIE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 9 y/o disabled daughter for when she feeds herself. I put them around her neck and put the rest on the table to set her plate on. They definitely catch most of the dropped food. Then I just shake them out, and throw them in the washer. The terrycloth is not very tightly woven so the strings pull out a bit when you catch them but they are nicely absorbent. As of quite a few washings, the closing tabs are still working great. 1 star - awful! Want my money back! 2 stars - bad but not horrendous 3 stars - decent/good 4 stars - really good! 5 stars - great! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: dustbunny

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these bibs because I had tried the disposable plastic ones and were not happy with them. I am happy to say that the terry bibs are great for me. The tab fastener in the back is easy to work and holds throughout my meals. Since I usually read while eating, I tend to spill enough bits of food on my clothes and this way the bib catches those bits and keeps my tops clean. I have not washed them yet, but they are thick enough that I am sure they will hold up to many launderings just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Old cntry gal

customer_reviews.title: Just What I needed
customer_reviews.text: Got the bibs and they are wonderful. It came in a pack of 3. I kept one and gave one to a couple of other seniors who have trouble not spilling everything they eat on their chest and shirts. Now we can have soup and runny stuff and our clothes are clean and we don't look like slobs. Would not hesitate to order from this vendor again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: John De Amicis

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I am a fat old man and as they say I wear my food well until I got these bibs. I have to emit washing clothes got a lot easier. The only complaint I have is the neck opening is to small for me. That I guess is good and bad because it catches all food but it would be nice is the made it with a bigger neck size,
customer_reviews.author: P. Pieri

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made Product!
customer_reviews.text: The product was cheaply made,cheaply put together & only useful as dust clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Mencio

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I was planning to like the bibs but after I washed them in warm water, they were coming apart. I would never buy your products again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Replace the velcro
customer_reviews.text: Bibs work OK, but they are HUGE - and I'm a big guy. Also a bit on the rough side, but that probably makes them lower priced and that's OK with me. But the velcro -- whoever bought the velcro for these bibs should be fired. It barely stuck while new and after going thru the washer, it wasn't much good at all. I'd really like to give a bette review as I use them every day, but the velcro has got to go.
customer_reviews.author: tingod

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Very good value.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. I looked at these offered by other sellers for a much higher price, pulse I got 6 as apposed to 4 with other dealers Can be hand washed or thrown in machine. Thicker than expected which was a plus. No dangling threads. Arrived ahead if time! Well Made. Got these for my father. Good coverage. Not lined with plastic backing, but for me that's good. I think they will have a longer life for that eeason.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Great clothing protector!!
customer_reviews.text: I tend to eat all meals and other items wearing these clothing protectors. I fell in late February and completely fractured my left hip, and the rehab facility I stayed at for 1 1/2 months insisted that we not refer to these products as “bibs”. In any case, they are thick and fluffy enough, a blue terry cloth fabric that is both absorbant and keeps clothing clean.
customer_reviews.author: Eilid Sidhe

customer_reviews.title: Poor Stitching
customer_reviews.text: Needed to replace similar once lost at my grandmother's physical rehab place. I should have tried to find my order for the original ones; these are very similar but more shoddily stitched. There were strings hanging off of every one and the white (for some reason not blue) stitching on the back by the neck is messy. I actually put them back in the box to return but another family member took them out! So guess we're keeping them :P
customer_reviews.author: Deal hunter E

customer_reviews.title: Not colorfast material
customer_reviews.text: This product is made from a poor quality, thin material; it might be okay for catching crumbs but won't help much with moist or liquid spills. The small square of velcro does not allow for size adjustment. Be careful when washing, it is NOT colorfast. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hay

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It really lives up to its description and has been an excellent buy. The Velcro neck is easily attached and the bib covers a large area. it does an excellent job of keeping my wife clean and free of dropped food. The bibs wash easily in the washing machine and dry pretty much wrinkle free from the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my disabled son. They are a decent terry cloth fabric, nothing fabulous. The velcro does not work well for my son as he keeps pulling them off, so I would like this same product with a different, more durable closure. I do love the size and length for his messes! Overall, a good buy. Update-it has been months now since I bought these. They are holding up well. We decided to use the velcro and tie them so they stay on him and are harder for him to remove and that has worked well. I just ordered more bibs.
customer_reviews.author: AModock

customer_reviews.title: not the same product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item before and they were great so I placed an other order and the product I received was not the same, they were a different color and they were actually thinner from the first ones I ordered months back.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Martinez

customer_reviews.title: so we just folded the neck down it didn't look like a bib then just a towel on his chest
customer_reviews.text: i bought these for my husband who had a stroke. i had them embroidered with his name so they would not get lost if put in the general population laundry. they were thick enough for that to be done but not to thick. the neck opening needs to be bigger for an adult. he did not care to have to use the neck velcro. so we just folded the neck down it didn't look like a bib then just a towel on his chest.
customer_reviews.author: Mommadukes

customer_reviews.title: Lasts a Long Time
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd time ordering these bibs. I can’t tell you much as I’m not the one using them but the last time I bought these it had to be over 2 years ago. Just last week did my aunt request new ones for my grandfather. So they do last a while. My grandfather uses them because he is blind and whenever he feeds himself or we do, it will keep his shirts clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: What we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: We were worried they would not have a large enough neck opening for someone with a large neck due to age and a goiter but these are doing the job. These are much better than the ones the nursing home was providing - larger overall, larger neck opening and the velcro works (for now, it will probably wear out with use but these are inexpensive). (We put his name on them with a permanent marker but the staff will probably take some away "accidentally" anyway, so we'll need to buy more...)
customer_reviews.author: Tom & Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: They do the job.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my father after he broke his right arm and was having to use his left hand to eat. Being right handed, this was not an easy task. These bibs were perfect. They saved his clothes, they are large enough to cover his shirt and his lap. The only thing is, don't wash with anything you don't want to be blue. I think after a couple of washes they won't bleed any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like better than the cloth/plastic bibs
customer_reviews.text: These bibs are soft and comfortable to wear, with great absorbency yet no leak thru. Would have preferred snaps instead of velcro on the closure, however these are much better than the stiffer cloth/plastic combos. I do wash them often and can see that I will probably replace them for new, in about 6 months, unless I use a safety pin for closure.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Page

customer_reviews.title: Thin, thin material
customer_reviews.text: Material is very thin. All bibs came with cuts. I ordered from another CO. and couldn't be happier. This bibs are very poor quality
customer_reviews.author: ximena

customer_reviews.title: Deluxe Adult Terry Cloth Bibs w/velcro Closure
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Very well made. Will hold up well. I am an ambulatory senior who apparently is a sloppy eater. I was so tired of getting food on my clothes. Many times the stains would not come out even with washing. This product would be great for seniors who are confined to wheel chairs or beds.
customer_reviews.author: Georgiagurl

customer_reviews.title: They are wonderful, the Velcro allows them to be used for ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my special education students who have difficulty eating solid foods. They are wonderful, the Velcro allows them to be used for a variety of neck sizes. They are easy to put on and take off. I toss them in the washer and dry them every day. I do recommend pre washing before your first use and wash them separately the first time. I tossed them in with other towels and they turned a few things blue.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Easy Closure - Easy Clean Up
customer_reviews.text: These are great. If you help care for a disabled adult that tends to leave part of their meal on their shirt, they're a blessing. The velcro closure makes them easy to use and the terry cloth comes clean in the wash with no stains. They save me a bunch of laundry and my charge no longer looks like they lost a paintball fight.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Winter

customer_reviews.title: ... brother in law for a Christmas gift and he loved them. I'm think about getting some for the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my brother in law for a Christmas gift and he loved them. I'm think about getting some for the ladies I dine with once a week when we go out for Mexican, since we are always dibbling sauce on ourselves.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sasso

customer_reviews.title: I liked everything about these bibs
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about these bibs. I love them. Many people who saw these being unwrapped had no clue anyone made these. I feel you need more advertising especially in elderly homes or independent living. They are great!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful.....
customer_reviews.text: These were just as expected...plenty big to cover part of the lap too...very soft esp. after washing, velcro at the neck. Terry cloth...Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: penname

customer_reviews.title: Very nice with minor flaws
customer_reviews.text: Nice bibs for eating while watching TV. I have ruined many shirts before breaking down and wearing these. (not just for nursing homes -- ha!). Not five stars because they are thin, and some terry loops have begun to pull away. Also, the neck is too large for me and the Velcro tab was a bit stiff and annoying. I took the Velcro off and just tie the ends behind my neck. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: AMF

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the bibs
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the bibs ... Velcro close makes them adjustable. I'm using them for my 91 yr. old Dad who has Alzheimer's and has become a very messy eater. We refer to them as "towels", not bibs, so he can retain any sense of dignity he might have. Worthwhile purchase, quick delivery and I'll purchase again if I need more.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mather

customer_reviews.title: Nice basic bibs.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice, but could be longer. They are not waterproof, so don't keep a person dry if they spill liquid on the bib, but for daily use they are pretty nice. They do keep the clothes dry for the most part, but would be nice if they were about 6 inches longer and had a plastic backing.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Use these in a group home setting and they seem to be well made and help with stains on clothes
customer_reviews.author: J.Blook

customer_reviews.title: 3 bibs
customer_reviews.text: I really don't know about durability since I've just begun to use these bibs. The only problem I had with the whole experience is, the accompanying picture shows 4 folded bibs while the description indicates 3 are included. And you do get 3, so why show 4? Anyway, this seems to be a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: Very pleasantly surprised that they arrived two days earlier than promised. They absorb well enough to keep from staining the clothing beneath, and being terry cloth they are washable. Only time will attest to the durability.
customer_reviews.author: Becu

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. I'm tired of using Shout or some other product to try and get my husband's stuff off his shirts. Now just before dinner I put it on him. Oh sure he complains but all I tell him is you do your laundry and see how you like it.
customer_reviews.author: sue g

customer_reviews.title: Velcro adult bib works great
customer_reviews.text: Really perfect solution to helping keep my 99 year old Grandmother clean as she eats. My Mom was trying to find something to fit an adult but was not successful so she was trying to make one from kitchen towels. I was happy to find these as they are easy to put in and off with the Velcro
customer_reviews.author: Karla Yvonne Koenig

customer_reviews.title: Easy to laundry
customer_reviews.text: These were bought for an elderly relative that has problems eating & has frequent spills on her clothes. They are large enough to cover her blouse & are easy to wash. They have held up well so far, after many washes. A nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Pat VunCannon

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these are not good at all. They are very thin and not very absorbent at all.
customer_reviews.author: Psalm 127

customer_reviews.title: So far I really like these. They are the same weight as those ...
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like these. They are the same weight as those used in the skilled nursing facility where I first saw adult terry cloth bibs. They cover her whole front and enough of her lap that she doesn't get food on her slacks unless she drops a lot at one time. They seem quite sturdy. I will find out if they are colorfast once I have washed them a couple of times.
customer_reviews.author: Polanka

customer_reviews.title: Deluxe Adult Terry Bibs with Velcro Closure
customer_reviews.text: The adult terry bibs are great for the nights in front of the TV when a sweet attack overcomes you and a bowl of ice cream is a must! I see pone in the car as well, so I don't have any coffee mishaps! i have ordered these 3 times and they keep getting thinner terrycloth. Come on folks, get better quality fabric!
customer_reviews.author: shopper1A

customer_reviews.title: No more stains!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They are soft, absorbent, and launder well and the velcro makes using them a snap. Bought them for my dad but my hubby saw them and wanted one, too!
customer_reviews.author: 2Blessed2bStressed

customer_reviews.title: Bibs Work Well
customer_reviews.text: I like these Terrycloth bibs because they do not have waterproof backing that tends to come apart after a few washings. They are adequate to protect garments from spills.
customer_reviews.author: Glen C. Bjornstad

customer_reviews.title: Check for holes
customer_reviews.text: My mother is in a nursing home unable to get out of bed and paper towels are not doing the job keeping food off her. I like the look of these. Just opened bag to check out and one had a dime size hole in it and one had a 3 inch tear down the middle. The others are ok but the material doesn't look very strong. A bit late to try and return for xmas not to mention the time involved. I will try to patch the holes.
customer_reviews.author: R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: I feed my mom who is battling Dementia and she seems to like them. She use to pull the disposable ones ...
customer_reviews.text: I use to buy the disposable bibs because it was convenient but I was just tossing $ in the trash. I feed my mom who is battling Dementia and she seems to like them. She use to pull the disposable ones off. They'd rip and have to put a new one on. She hasn't tugged on these and if she did. I'll just put them back on. Velcro was the way to go for me.
customer_reviews.author: javier marin

customer_reviews.title: Very useful for good coverage.
customer_reviews.text: This product works well for my husband. The bibs seem to wash well but have only been in use a short time. The length is good , covers well, would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne E. Curtin

customer_reviews.title: These have made mealtime for an elderly person much neater ...
customer_reviews.text: These have made mealtime for an elderly person much neater. The only problem is with laundering. The Velcro closure tends to stick to other fabrics in the dryer, so you need to close prior to laundering, and don't mix with sheer fabrics such as nylon.
customer_reviews.author: L. Held

customer_reviews.title: Good Coverage, Washes and Dries Easily
customer_reviews.text: This bib gives good frontal coverage. It is wide enough and long enough to keep food off your lap. We didn't have a problem with liquid spills, so we did not get bibs with waterproof backing. These wash well and are easy to dry. My elderly father-in-law is able to put his bib on and use the velcro closure without help.
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Work fine, and are needed for many elderly individuals.
customer_reviews.text: These work fine. They are basic adult bibs. Many elderly people cannot eat without making a mess; no shame in that. I bought these, and followed up with several more. A necessary item.
customer_reviews.author: Donald J. Miester, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Work very well
customer_reviews.text: I haven't cleaned these yet nor can I comment on durability. However, they are very easy to use and are a shirt saver. No more daily stains from dribbled or dropped food.
customer_reviews.author: F. Cheek

customer_reviews.title: Excellent material, good pricing, Eat up!
customer_reviews.text: Really like these bibs. They’re pretty thick, kinda like towels, so soup eating is a breeze! There not oversized, so I don’t feel odd, using one at work or the hibachi place. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JMDiablo

customer_reviews.title: Company DID NOT respond back!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the bibs for my father and they serve the purpose. The cut out for the head was not centered correctly. This really doesn’t affect anything other then appearance. Sent the company an email that went unanswered.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for keeping the soup off your shirt.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the three-pack of these wonderful bibs for my wife and myself. They keep any spillage from ruining our clothes, are very absorbent and easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Steven A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: My adult sized daughter had jaw surgery and had to eat through a food syringe for a month. it was not easy for her to do and it was messy. Getting these adult bibs was the answer. Well made and easy to wash. We got a half dozen to ensure we always had a clean one ready for her at every meal.
customer_reviews.author: Spicy Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Value. These bibs do the job. They’re soft, light weight, washable and the Velcro fastener keeps them secure. I recommend them highly.
customer_reviews.author: roz klein

customer_reviews.title: Delux Adult Terry Cloth Bigs with Velcro
customer_reviews.text: Very thin and coarse material. Even after washing these and using quite a bit of fabric softener, they are still rough. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: BandD

customer_reviews.title: What works, works! Happy at last.
customer_reviews.text: I got these for myself. I broke my arm and kept spilling my food all over. Thes are easy to put on and wash easily. I think I’ll get my husband to use them as well. Never thought I’d be using a bib at my age, 68, but desperate times, call for desperate measures.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: These do what they are supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I love these, but my 94-year old mother doesn't so much. Still, I'm the one who does the laundry. They are excellent as a bib -- but the binding comes off in places and I regularly find strings from the thin terrycloth. I have to label each one with her name, so I'm glad the binding is white and takes the marker well.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great idea. But poor construction, falls apart easily.
customer_reviews.text: Its absorbent but not very durable, especially if you wash them in a washing machine. I have a top load washer that does not use an agitator and they are still falling apart, one of them started falling apart after the first wash.
customer_reviews.author: Scott B.

customer_reviews.title: Never even got to use!
customer_reviews.text: This is what it looked like after washing it before wearing it for the first time!
customer_reviews.author: Lindasue

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: After laundering, one bib actually fell apart.....the other two are still usable but the stitching is a bit messed up. It started out as a good idea...but!!!
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Large, Washable
customer_reviews.text: They are light weight but not too much so. Good for general bib for adults. Not waterproof. Light weight terry cloth. Velcro tabs are large enough to hold well and not be irritating.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Good seller
customer_reviews.text: Nice size for adults. Good quality. As stated these are terry cloth, so not waterproof. Machine washable. Comes out good as new. I’ve ordered these twice & has good service & quick shipments both times
customer_reviews.author: Judy Martin

customer_reviews.title: JUST PURCHASED-GOOD ADULT SIZE
customer_reviews.text: The bib is a good size for an adult. They are a little coarse but I think after washing and using some fabric softener, they should be fine. Good item for the price.
customer_reviews.author: KM-PA

customer_reviews.title: great blue cotton adult bibs
customer_reviews.text: I have had several of these bibs in the past and I keep getting more when the old ones finally wear out. The wash and dry nice and look nice.
customer_reviews.author: junemml

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: They were awful in every way. They are poorly made, the velco is hardly sewn on, and thinner than thin. I will only use them as rags..
customer_reviews.author: C. D. Houck

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage but closure very scratchy and itchy
customer_reviews.text: They work perfectly fine. My problem is that the Velcro closure is very stiff, scratchy and itchy. I wash and dry them every chance I get hoping they will soften up. They are actually quite uncomfortable.If they soften up they will be exactly what I'm looking for. Otherwise, they have good coverage but not waterproof if that quality is needed.
customer_reviews.author: jojojcw

customer_reviews.title: Great quality item!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my elderly father whom I assist in caregiving. Very pleased with this purchase. They close comfortably around his neck, are long and of good quality. Easy to launder. I plan on ordering another pack so that he can have a week's supply. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Lane Woods

customer_reviews.title: Worked OK
customer_reviews.text: I make my wife who has dementia use it at mealtime and brushing her teeth. The Velcro tabs are not big enough so the bibs keep falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Ray K.

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my dad who has had a stroke and need the extra protection for his clothing. When I received them, I didn't think the quality was up to standard. Thinking that after I washed them, they would soften and be okay. Wrong. After washing and drying them, there were threads coming loose everywhere on all of them. I really think I could have made my own for my dad instead of paying this price for ones that were so badly made. Very poor quality!!
customer_reviews.author: lacarter

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality!!
customer_reviews.text: They don't even deserve a 1. VERY CHEAP TERRY CLOTH. Looks like a 5 year old made it. The advertising picture shows 4 but it's a 3 pack. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!! These are going back.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki J. Letourneau

customer_reviews.title: I like the item overall, but it's scratchy at the neck.
customer_reviews.text: Scratchy at the neck where the hook & loop fastening does not stay completely in place. Irritates the skin while wearing. Otherwise, this is a pretty nice cover.
customer_reviews.author: VAnne

customer_reviews.title: Large, comfy, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: These bibs are large, soft and comfortable and easy to get on and off. Throw them in the wash and you're set for the next use. I didn't need waterproof bibs, so these are perfect for me!
customer_reviews.author: J.C. Velson

customer_reviews.title: Looking for a better bib
customer_reviews.text: Loops of thread get caught on the velcro closures and pull. Constantly having to trim threads. look ing for a better bib.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Venable

customer_reviews.title: It's sturdy and washes well
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time and was as described. It's sturdy and washes well. However, I was disappointed that the neck opening was large even when fastened, allowing the bib to slide around. I suggest about three small velcro tabs spaced to allow for adjustability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK, but not good quality Velcro
customer_reviews.text: I like these in general, but the velcro closure is already giving out, after less than two months. I'm going to have to change the velcro or put a snap or something else on them to hold them closed.
customer_reviews.author: Emmie

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Really cheap and rough hard to clean food stuck on off of and way to short
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in the quality of this item. Lots of snags on all three bibs. The water was quite blue when I washed the bibs separately. The terrycloth fabric is poor quality. I do like the length. I would have sent them back but was in desperate need of these for my husband. I would not buy these again nor would I recommend that someone else buy them.
customer_reviews.author: LRSyd

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed for my mom with Alzheimer's.
customer_reviews.text: These are durable and wash well. They've not come apart after many washes. They are long enough to cover my mom's lap while she's sitting at the dinner table. They are soft and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: L Silva

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: These adult bibs have basically fallen apart in a very short period of time. The trim around the edges began to pull away after the first time they were washed and the terry cloth has begun to fall apart as a result. I definitely would NOT buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly E. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Great Bib for the Elderly
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bibs for my 96-yr old mother. They are just the right length to protect her clothes and they wash up nicely in the washing machine. There is some wear and tear on the seams on the collar, but overall they are a great product. I will order them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT “Deluxe”
customer_reviews.text: These are certainly NOT “deluxe terry”. The fabric is thin and started to ravel after just a few washings. On one of the bibs, the stitches on the binding came out.
customer_reviews.author: Honin

customer_reviews.title: This is our second purchase great value and durable
customer_reviews.text: Second purchase very well made and durable. This works great for elderly parents. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: G E Treal

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in great condition!!! They look just like the photo and I’m excited to use them after my jaw surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Bibs
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and shipped them to my sister for her special needs son. She said they are "awesome and exactly what she needed" for mealtime!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Protects against soy sauce!!
customer_reviews.text: We eat dinner in the living room, in front of the TV... Just last night, my husband, who likes to wear light-colored shirts, practically POURED soy sauce on himself. But this time, on the bib! He scrambled to see if any had gone through to his shirt. CLEAN! Good, good product. Now he just has to remember to wear the bib each time he eats...
customer_reviews.author: The Typist

customer_reviews.title: great product.
customer_reviews.text: I got these adult bibs for my grandmother and they cover her well when she eats. She has not complained of any discomfort, I have only used one out of the three so I have yet to see how they do in the washing machine. Overall, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Marina Michelle Martinez

customer_reviews.title: perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my father in law that has a big belly and he LOVES them. They are generously sized and just as described.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Saragusa

customer_reviews.title: Great Gag Gift
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a gag gift for my significant other who always spills stuff on his shirt!
customer_reviews.author: Shan

product_meta.title: Deluxe Adult Terry Cloth Bibs - 6PK Blue
product_meta.description:
Size:6 Pack

 Deluxe Adult Terry Cloth BIBS CLOSURE - Blue - 6PK


 These adult terry bibs are an excellent choice for caregivers, nursing homes, and hospitals. Or even those with messy spouses! 

Made of terry material for maximum absorbency, these bibs will provide the ultimate protection against spills and messes!

Care Instructions

 Machine Washable
Dryer friendly


Dimension

 18" x 30" Inch

Our Customer Satisfaction Money-Back Guarantee

If you are not satisfied with the bibs just return them within 30 days for a full refund. No questions asked, Hassle Free!

Scroll up to click the Add to Cart button to have your bibs shipped to you today.
feature_bullets: INCLUDES- 6pk Deluxe 100% Cotton Terry Adult BIBS 18"x30' inch BLUE
PROTECTS against spills during meals or messy projects, Protects clothing and catches stains.
CARE INSTRUCTION- Machine Wash & Dry - Specially processed to resist shrinking and minimize lint.
EASE OF USE- velcro Closure for Easy Use
QUALITY- Custom fitted neck piece allows for easy and Confortable wear during meal times.
